hero.title: Welcome to MR.Ink Tattoo
hero.subtitle: We bring your ideas to life with custom tattoos and professional piercings. Let's create something amazing together!

pircing.title: Mrs. Steel - Piercing Specialist
pircing.intro: Experience professional piercing artistry with the highest safety and hygiene standards.

about.title: About Mrs. Steel
about.description: Selina 'Mrs. Steel' Riss is the piercing specialist at Mr. Ink Tattoo. She values individual consultation and ensures every client feels comfortable and safe.
about.description2: With comprehensive training in piercing techniques and anatomy, Mrs. Steel finds the perfect piercing for each client. From classic ear piercings to body piercings – quality and safety come first.

services.title: Our Piercing Services
services.earDesc: Lobe, Helix, Tragus, Daith and more

standards.title: Our Standards
standards.sterileDesc: Strict hygiene protocols for your safety

pircing.portfolioDesc: Here you can see various works by Mrs. Steel in different piercing styles.

cta.title: Ready for a New Piercing?
cta.subtitle: Book an appointment for a personal consultation

gallery.title: Portfolio
gallery.subtitle: Explore our latest tattoo creations
gallery.portfolioDesc: Dive into our collection of unique tattoos. Each artwork tells a story and showcases our artists' mastery.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the talented artists behind Mr. Ink Tattoo
team.maxBio: Max is the owner of Mr. Ink Tattoo in Nürtingen. With his feel for current trends and an eye for aesthetics, he creates individual tattoos – whether classic motifs or modern styles. His precision and passion for custom artwork define his work. Outside the studio, Max is a family man.
team.selinaBio: Selina 'Mrs. Steel' Riss handles all piercings at Mr. Ink Tattoo. With comprehensive training in anatomy and hygiene, she ensures safe and beautiful results.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your tattoo journey? Get in touch today!

form.thankYou: Thank you for your inquiry. We'll get back to you soon.

galleryInfo.title: Our Portfolio
galleryInfo.description: Each piece in our gallery represents hours of careful planning, artistic skill, and collaborative work with our clients. From small, delicate designs to large, complex compositions, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional quality and bringing our clients' visions to life.
